name: Martin Gogolla
content: Prof. Dr. Martin Gogolla Prof. Dr. Martin Gogolla Consultation hour: By appointment and thursday 16:00-17:00 in lecture weeks only Sprechstunde: Nach Vereinbarung und Donnerstag 16:00-17:00 in den Veranstaltungswochen Prof. Dr. Martin Gogolla Database Systems Group Department for Mathematics and Computer Science University of Bremen PO Box 330440 D-28334 Bremen GERMANY Room: MZH 8150 Phone: (++49)+421/218-63981 (Direct calling) (++49)+421/218-63980 (Secretary) Fax: (++49)+421/218-3054 Email: gogolla [at] informatik [dot] uni [minus] bremen [dot] de [no blanks] Research interests (in historical order) Formal specification of safe and secure systems Graph grammars and graph transformations Semantics of languages, especially data base languages Formal methods in information systems design Object-oriented software development Home|People|Teaching|Publications
